model

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    This class acts as a data transfer object for each of the users in the database. It also contains methods for interacting with the user's created team.
    Author:
    d_mit

    • Method Detail

      • addPlayerToTeam

        public java.lang.String addPlayerToTeam(Player p,
                                        int position)
        This method is called when a user is creating a team for the first time and is adding a player into the team.
        Parameters:
        p - the Player object being added
        position - the position in the squad the player is being assigned to
        Returns:
        a String message depicting wether or not the addition was permitted

      • swapPlayersInTeam

        public java.lang.String swapPlayersInTeam(Player p,
                                          int position)
        This method is used when a user is managing their team and wants to swap players on the field with players on the bench.
        Parameters:
        p - Player object being introduced onto pitch
        position - integer position of player being substituted to sideline
        Returns:
        String message indicating player swap was successful

      • removePlayerFromTeam

        public java.lang.String removePlayerFromTeam(int position)
        This method is used when a user is creating a team for the first time. It is called to remove a player from the team who has already been added in.
        Parameters:
        position - the integer position of the player being removed
        Returns:
        a String message depicting wether or not the removal was successful or more action was needed

      • createTeam

        public void createTeam(java.util.UUID id)
        Called when a User is first instantiated.
        Parameters:
        id - the uuid of the owner (user) of the team
